vjust
blocks.content: Soundness justification theorem for ~ df-v . (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 27-Apr-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm vjust(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1)))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))))
  2th(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))))
  sbt(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  equid(s0)
  sbt(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1)))
  equid(s1)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  df-clab(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))))
}

blocks.name: df-universe
blocks.content: Define the universal class. Definition 5.20 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 21. Also Definition 2.9 of [Quine] p. 19. The class ` _V ` can be described as the "class of all sets"; ~ vprc proves that ` _V ` is not itself a set in ZFC. We will frequently use the expression ` A e. _V ` as a short way to say " ` A ` is a set", and ~ isset proves that this expression has the same meaning as ` E. x x = A ` . The class ` _V ` is called the "von Neumann universe", however, the letter "V" is not a tribute to the name of von Neumann. The letter "V" was used earlier by Peano in 1889 for the universe of sets, where the letter V is derived from the word "Verum". Peano's notation V was adopted by Whitehead and Russell in Principia Mathematica for the class of all sets in 1910. For a general discussion of the theory of classes, see ~ mmset.html#class . (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)

blocks.name: vex
blocks.content: All setvar variables are sets (see ~ isset ). Theorem 6.8 of [Quine] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)

blocks.name: elv
blocks.content: If a proposition is implied by ` x e. _V ` (which is true, see ~ vex ), then it is true. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 13-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: elvd
blocks.content: If a proposition is implied by ` x e. _V ` (which is true, see ~ vex ) and another antecedent, then it is implied by that other antecedent. Deduction associated with ~ elv . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: el2v
blocks.content: If a proposition is implied by ` x e. _V ` and ` y e. _V ` (which is true, see ~ vex ), then it is true. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 13-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: eqv
blocks.content: The universe contains every set. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2006.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , ~ ax-13 . (Revised by BJ, 10-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: eqvf
blocks.content: The universe contains every set. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: abv
blocks.content: The class of sets verifying a property is the universal class if and only if that property is a tautology. The reverse implication ( ~ bj-abv ) requires fewer axioms. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm abv(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wceq(cab(s0, w0), universe), wal(s0, w0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wceq(cab(s0, w0), universe), wal(s0, w0), wal(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0))), wal(hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  albii(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  eqv(hs0, cab(s0, w0))
  sb8v(s0, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm abv(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ({ s0 | w0 } = ùïå ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, w0))
} = {
  3bitr4i({ s0 | w0 } = ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà { s0 | w0 }), ‚àÄ(hs0,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  albii(hs0, hs0 ‚àà { s0 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  eqv(hs0, { s0 | w0 })
  sb8v(s0, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | w0 })
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: isset
blocks.content: Two ways to say " ` A ` is a set": A class ` A ` is a member of the universal class ` _V ` (see ~ df-v ) if and only if the class ` A ` exists (i.e. there exists some set ` x ` equal to class ` A ` ). Theorem 6.9 of [Quine] p. 43. _Notational convention_: We will use the notational device " ` A e. _V ` " to mean " ` A ` is a set" very frequently, for example in ~ uniex . Note that a class ` A ` which is not a set is called a _proper class_. In some theorems, such as ~ uniexg , in order to shorten certain proofs we use the more general antecedent ` A e. V ` instead of ` A e. _V ` to mean " ` A ` is a set." Note that a constant is implicitly considered distinct from all variables. This is why ` _V ` is not included in the distinct variable list, even though ~ df-clel requires that the expression substituted for ` B ` not contain ` x ` . (Also, the Metamath spec does not allow constants in the distinct variable list.) (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)

blocks.name: issetf
blocks.content: A version of ~ isset that does not require ` x ` and ` A ` to be distinct. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 6-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm issetf(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  isset(hs0, c0)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issetf(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 = c0))
  isset(hs0, c0)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, hs0 = c0, s0 = c0)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, s0 = c0)
  eqeq1(hs0, s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = c0)
}

blocks.name: isseti
blocks.content: A way to say " ` A ` is a set" (inference form). (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: issetri
blocks.content: A way to say " ` A ` is a set" (inference form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: eqvisset
blocks.content: A class equal to a variable is a set. Note the absence of disjoint variable condition, contrary to ~ isset and ~ issetri . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: elex
blocks.content: If a class is a member of another class, then it is a set. Theorem 6.12 of [Quine] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: elexi
blocks.content: If a class is a member of another class, then it is a set. Inference associated with ~ elex . (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: elexd
blocks.content: If a class is a member of another class, then it is a set. Deduction associated with ~ elex . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: elisset
blocks.content: An element of a class exists. (Contributed by NM, 1-May-1995.)

blocks.name: elex2
blocks.content: If a class contains another class, then it contains some set. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: elex22
blocks.content: If two classes each contain another class, then both contain some set. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 24-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm elex22(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  alrimiv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  anim12ii(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eleq1a(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  eleq1a(c0, c2, cv(s0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  exim(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elex22(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  alrimiv(s0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)))
  anim12ii(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1a(c0, c1, s0)
  eleq1a(c0, c2, s0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  exim(s0, s0 = c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: prcnel
blocks.content: A proper class doesn't belong to any class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: ralcom4

blocks.name: rexcom4

blocks.name: rexcom4b
blocks.content: Specialized existential commutation lemma. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 1-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexcom4b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))), wrex(s1, c0, w0))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitr4i(wex(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))), wrex(s1, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))
  rexcom4a(s0, s1, c0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  rexbii(s1, c0, w0, wa(w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  biantru(w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  isseti(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexcom4b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, w0))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitr4i(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(w0 ‚àß s0 = c1))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c1))))
  rexcom4a(s0, s1, c0, w0, s0 = c1)
  rexbii(s1, c0, w0, (w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c1)))
  biantru(w0, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c1))
  isseti(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: ceqsalt
blocks.content: Closed theorem version of ~ ceqsalg . (Contributed by NM, 28-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ceqsalt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), w0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), w0)
  mpid(w3a(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  3ad2ant3(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  sylibd(w3a(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  3ad2ant2(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))))
  al2imi(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  imim3i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0), w1, w0)
  biimp(w1, w0)
  3ad2ant1(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)))
  19.23t(s0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  mpbid(w3a(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))))
  3ad2ant2(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))))
  alimi(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  com23(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  imim2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0), wi(w0, w1))
  biimpr(w1, w0)
  3ad2ant1(wnf(s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)))))
  19.21t(s0, w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ceqsalt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbid((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)), w0)
  mpid((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)), w0, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  3ad2ant3(F/(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  sylibd((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0)))
  3ad2ant2(F/(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))))
  al2imi(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))
  imim3i(s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üî w0), w1, w0)
  biimp(w1, w0)
  3ad2ant1(F/(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))‚Üî(‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0)))
  19.23t(s0, w0, s0 = c0)
  mpbid((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))), ‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))))
  3ad2ant2(F/(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))))
  alimi(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), (w0 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)))
  com23((s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), w0, s0 = c0, w1)
  imim2i(s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üî w0), (w0 ‚Üí w1))
  biimpr(w1, w0)
  3ad2ant1(F/(s0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)))‚Üî(w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)))))
  19.21t(s0, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))
}

thm ceqsralt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {

  3bitri(wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))))
  df-ral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  3bitr3i(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w1))
  imbi1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))

  biimt(wcel(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

  ‚ä¢ ((F/(s0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1))‚Üî w0))

  3bitr3i((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w1)), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí w1), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí w1))
  imbi1i((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c0), w1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c0))
  pm5.32ri(s0 ‚àà c1, s0 = c0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  impexp(s0 ‚àà c1, s0 = c0, w1)

thm 2gencl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0)
  -| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c4, c0)))
  -| wb(wcel(c2, c1), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c5, c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(c4, c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(c5, c2), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), w0)
  gencl(s1, c5, c2, wcel(c2, c1), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
  bitri(wcel(c2, c1), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(c5, c2))), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c5, c2)))
  df-rex(s1, c3, wceq(c5, c2))
  imbi2d(wceq(c5, c2), wcel(c0, c1), w2, w0)
  com12(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c0, c1), w2)
  gencl(s0, c4, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c3), w2), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c4, c0))), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c4, c0)))
  df-rex(s0, c3, wceq(c4, c0))
  imbi2d(wceq(c4, c0), wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1, w2)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c3), w2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm 2gencl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c4 = c0))
  ‚ä£ (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c5 = c2))
  ‚ä£ (c4 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (c5 = c2 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, w0)
  gencl(s1, c5, c2, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0), s1 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w2))
  bitri(c2 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c5 = c2)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c5 = c2))
  df-rex(s1, c3, c5 = c2)
  imbi2d(c5 = c2, c0 ‚àà c1, w2, w0)
  com12(s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c1, w2)
  gencl(s0, c4, c0, c0 ‚àà c1, (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí w2), s0 ‚àà c3, (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí w1))
  bitri(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 = c0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, c4 = c0))
  df-rex(s0, c3, c4 = c0)
  imbi2d(c4 = c0, s1 ‚àà c3, w1, w2)
  ex(s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, s1 ‚àà c3, w2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm 3gencl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w0)

  -| wb(wcel(c3, c1), wrex(s2, c4, wceq(c7, c3)))

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), w0)
  com12(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), w0)
  gencl(s2, c7, c3, wcel(c3, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0), wcel(cv(s2), c4), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3))
  bitri(wcel(c3, c1), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wceq(c7, c3))), wrex(s2, c4, wceq(c7, c3)))
  df-rex(s2, c4, wceq(c7, c3))
  imbi2d(wceq(c7, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3, w0)
  com12(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3)
  2gencl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, wi(wcel(cv(s2), c4), w3), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c4), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c4), w2))
  imbi2d(wceq(c5, c0), wcel(cv(s2), c4), w1, w2)
  imbi2d(wceq(c6, c2), wcel(cv(s2), c4), w2, w3)
  3expia(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c4), w2)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c4), w3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 3gencl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5 = c0))
  ‚ä£ (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, c6 = c2))

  ‚ä£ (c6 = c2 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w3))

  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c4)‚Üí w1)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1, w0)

  bitri(c3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c7 = c3)), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c4, c7 = c3))
  df-rex(s2, c4, c7 = c3)
  imbi2d(c7 = c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w3, w0)
  com12(s2 ‚àà c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w3)
  2gencl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, (s2 ‚àà c4 ‚Üí w3), (s2 ‚àà c4 ‚Üí w1), (s2 ‚àà c4 ‚Üí w2))
  imbi2d(c5 = c0, s2 ‚àà c4, w1, w2)
  imbi2d(c6 = c2, s2 ‚àà c4, w2, w3)
  3expia(s0 ‚àà c4, s1 ‚àà c4, s2 ‚àà c4, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, s2 ‚àà c4, w2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s2 ‚àà c4, w3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: cgsexg
blocks.content: Implicit substitution inference for general classes. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-2007.)

thm cgsexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), w2)
  exlimiv(s0, wa(w0, w1), w2)
  biimpa(w0, w1, w2)
  syl5com(wcel(c0, c1), w2, wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s0, w0))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  eximi(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  eximdv(s0, w2, w0, wa(w0, w1))
  ancld(w2, w0, w1)
  biimprcd(w2, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cgsexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1))‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1)), w2)

  biimpa(w0, w1, w2)
  syl5com(c0 ‚àà c1, w2, ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1)), ‚àÉ(s0, w0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0, w0), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  eximi(s0, s0 = c0, w0)
  eximdv(s0, w2, w0, (w0 ‚àß w1))
  ancld(w2, w0, w1)
  biimprcd(w2, w0, w1)
}

thm cgsex2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), w2))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), w2)
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1), w2)
  biimpa(w0, w1, w2)
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  2eximi(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w0)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w2, w0, wa(w0, w1))
  ancld(w2, w0, w1)
  biimprcd(w2, w0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm cgsex2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(w0 ‚àß w1)))‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí w0)

  biimprcd(w2, w0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)

thm cgsex4g(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(w0, w1))))), w2))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

} = {

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))))))))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))))))), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))

  elisset(s1, c2, c3)

  sylibr(wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)), wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5)))), wa(wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wex(s3, wceq(cv(s3), c5))))

  2eximi(s2, s3, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w2, wex(s2, wex(s3, w0)), wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(w0, w1))))
  2eximdv(s2, s3, w2, w0, wa(w0, w1))

blocks.name: ceqsex
blocks.content: Elimination of an existential quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ceqsex(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbii(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1)
  exlimi(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0), w1)
  biimpa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w1)
  mpisyl(w1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  alrimi(s0, w1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  biimprcd(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  isseti(s0, c0)
  exintr(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
}

thm ceqsex(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß w0))‚Üî w1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbii(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß w0)), w1)
  exlimi(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß w0), w1)
  biimpa(s0 = c0, w0, w1)
  mpisyl(w1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß w0)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0)), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  alrimi(s0, w1, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))
  biimprcd(w1, s0 = c0, w0)
  isseti(s0, c0)
  exintr(s0, s0 = c0, w0)
}

thm ceqsex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), w1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w2)))

  bitri(wex(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))))
  exbii(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))
  3anass(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)
  19.42v(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))
  ceqsex(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  nfex(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w2))
  nfan(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), w2)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  exbidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w2))

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0)))))

blocks.name: gencbvex
blocks.content: Change of bound variable using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm gencbvex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s1, wa(w2, w3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wb(w2, wex(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr3i(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s1, wa(w2, w3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3)))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3)))))
  excom(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3)))
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3))), wa(w0, w1))
  ceqsexv(s1, c0, wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w1))
  eqcoms(cv(s1), c0, wb(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w1)))
  bicomd(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), w0, w1, w2, w3)
  exbii(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3))), wa(w2, w3))
  bitri(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3))), wa(w2, w3), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wa(w2, w3)))
  19.41v(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(w2, w3))
  impbii(wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wa(w2, w3)), wa(w2, w3))
  simpr(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wa(w2, w3))
  ancri(wa(w2, w3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  adantr(w2, w3, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  sylbi(w2, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wex(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)))))
  eximi(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  biimpi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  eqcom(c0, cv(s1))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gencbvex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1,(w2 ‚àß w3)))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w3))
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (w2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß c0 = s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr3i(‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1)), ‚àÉ(s1,(w2 ‚àß w3)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3)))), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3)))))
  excom(s0, s1, (s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3)))
  exbii(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3))), (w0 ‚àß w1))
  ceqsexv(s1, c0, (w2 ‚àß w3), (w0 ‚àß w1))
  eqcoms(s1, c0, ((w2 ‚àß w3)‚Üî(w0 ‚àß w1)))
  bicomd(c0 = s1, (w2 ‚àß w3), (w0 ‚àß w1))
  anbi12d(c0 = s1, w0, w1, w2, w3)
  exbii(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3))), (w2 ‚àß w3))
  bitri(‚àÉ(s0,(s1 = c0 ‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3))), (w2 ‚àß w3), (‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0)‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3)))
  19.41v(s0, s1 = c0, (w2 ‚àß w3))
  impbii((‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0)‚àß(w2 ‚àß w3)), (w2 ‚àß w3))
  simpr(‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0), (w2 ‚àß w3))
  ancri((w2 ‚àß w3), ‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0))
  adantr(w2, w3, ‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0))
  sylbi(w2, ‚àÉ(s0, s1 = c0), ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß c0 = s1)))
  eximi(s0, (w0 ‚àß c0 = s1), s1 = c0)
  adantl(w0, c0 = s1, s1 = c0)
  biimpi(c0 = s1, s1 = c0)
  eqcom(c0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: gencbvex2
blocks.content: Restatement of ~ gencbvex with weaker hypotheses. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Dec-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm gencbvex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s1, wa(w2, w3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(w2, wex(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  gencbvex(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3)
  impbii(w2, wex(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)))))
  exlimiv(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1))), w2)
  biimpac(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)), w2)
}

thm gencbvex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß w1))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1,(w2 ‚àß w3)))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w3))
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (w2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß c0 = s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  gencbvex(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3)
  impbii(w2, ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß c0 = s1)))
  exlimiv(s0, (w0 ‚àß c0 = s1), w2)
  biimpac(w0, c0 = s1, w2)
}

blocks.name: gencbval
blocks.content: Change of bound variable using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm gencbval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s1, wi(w2, w3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wb(w2, wex(s0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  con4bii(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s1, wi(w2, w3)))
  3bitr3i(wn(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))), wn(wal(s1, wi(w2, w3))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1))), wex(s1, wa(w2, wn(w3))))
  gencbvex(s0, s1, c0, w0, wn(w1), w2, wn(w3))
  notbid(wceq(c0, cv(s1)), w1, w3)
  exanali(s0, w0, w1)
  exanali(s1, w2, w3)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w3)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gencbval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí w1))‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1,(w2 ‚Üí w3)))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w3))
  ‚ä£ (c0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (w2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß c0 = s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  con4bii(‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí w1)), ‚àÄ(s1,(w2 ‚Üí w3)))
  3bitr3i(¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0,(w0 ‚Üí w1)), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1,(w2 ‚Üí w3)), ‚àÉ(s0,(w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1)), ‚àÉ(s1,(w2 ‚àß ¬¨ w3)))
  gencbvex(s0, s1, c0, w0, ¬¨ w1, w2, ¬¨ w3)
  notbid(c0 = s1, w1, w3)
  exanali(s0, w0, w1)
  exanali(s1, w2, w3)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w3)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}

blocks.name: sbhypf
blocks.content: Introduce an explicit substitution into an implicit substitution hypothesis. See also ~ csbhypf . (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbhypf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1))
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))))
  equsexvw(s1, s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c0)
  exlimi(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1))
  nfbi(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)
  nfs1v(s1, s0, w0)
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0), wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1, w0)
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
  sbequ12(s1, s0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbhypf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí([s0 / s1]w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(s0 = c0, ([s0 / s1]w0 ‚Üî w1), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = s0 ‚àß s1 = c0)))
  equsexvw(s1, s0, s1 = c0, s0 = c0)
  eqeq1(s1, s0, c0)
  exlimi(s1, (s1 = s0 ‚àß s1 = c0), ([s0 / s1]w0 ‚Üî w1))
  nfbi(s1, [s0 / s1]w0, w1)
  nfs1v(s1, s0, w0)
  sylan9bb(s1 = s0, s1 = c0, [s0 / s1]w0, w1, w0)
  bicomd(s1 = s0, [s0 / s1]w0, w0)
  sbequ12(s1, s0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: vtoclgft
blocks.content: Closed theorem form of ~ vtoclgf . (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 11-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtoclgft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wcel(c0, c1)), w0)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wcel(c0, c1)), w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  3impia(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  ad2antrr(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  syl5ib(wnfc(s0, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  elisset(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, wnfc(s0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  nfeqd(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfcvd(s0, cv(hs0), wnfc(s0, c0))
  id(wnfc(s0, c0))
  a1i(wnfc(s0, c0), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  3adant3(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  imp(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  syl5ib(wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))), wal(s0, w1)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  alanimi(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), w1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  imp(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), w1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  com23(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0)), w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  imim2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0), wi(w1, w0))
  biimp(w1, w0)
  adantl(wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w0), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)))
  19.23t(s0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wnfc(s0, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vtoclgft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0)
} = {
  mpd(((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1))‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), w0, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  3impia((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1)), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0))
  ad2antrr(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, w0), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)))
  syl5ib(F/(s0, c0), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 = c0))
  elisset(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, F/(s0, c0), hs0 = c0, s0 = c0)
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  nfeqd(s0, hs0, c0, F/(s0, c0))
  nfcvd(s0, hs0, F/(s0, c0))
  id(F/(s0, c0))
  a1i(F/(s0, c0), (hs0 = s0 ‚Üí(hs0 = c0 ‚Üî s0 = c0)))
  eqeq1(hs0, s0, c0)
  3adant3((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1)), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0))
  imp((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1)), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0))
  syl5ib((F/(s0, c0)‚àß F/(s0, w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, w1)), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0)))
  alanimi(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), w1, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))
  imp((s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), w1, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))
  com23((s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0)), w1, s0 = c0, w0)
  imim2i(s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üî w0), (w1 ‚Üí w0))
  biimp(w1, w0)
  adantl(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, w0), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí w0))‚Üî(‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚Üí w0)))
  19.23t(s0, w0, s0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(F/(s0, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: vtocldf
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtocldf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  syl221anc(w0, w1, wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))), wal(s0, w2), wcel(c0, c1))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1)))
  ex(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  alrimi(s0, w0, w2)
  vtoclgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vtocldf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  syl221anc(w0, w1, F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, w1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1))), ‚àÄ(s0, w2), c0 ‚àà c1)
  alrimi(s0, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1)))
  ex(w0, s0 = c0, (w2 ‚Üî w1))
  alrimi(s0, w0, w2)
  vtoclgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
}

blocks.name: vtocld
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtocld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  vtocldf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcvd(s0, c0, w0)
  nfvd(s0, w0, w1)
}

thm vtocld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

blocks.name: vtoclf
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable. This is a generalization of ~ chvar . (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtoclf(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- w0
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w1
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, w1)
  19.36i(s0, w1, w0)
  eximii(s0, wi(w1, w0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  isseti(s0, c0)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vtoclf(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ w0
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ w1
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, w1)
  19.36i(s0, w1, w0)
  eximii(s0, (w1 ‚Üí w0), s0 = c0)
  isseti(s0, c0)
  biimpd(s0 = c0, w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: vtocl
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable. See also ~ vtoclALT . (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 . (Revised by BJ, 29-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtocl(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- w0
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w1
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, w1)
  19.36iv(s0, w1, w0)
  eximii(s0, wi(w1, w0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  isseti(s0, c0)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: vtoclALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ vtocl . Shorter but requires more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: vtocl2
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of classes for setvar variables. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtocl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- w0
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w1
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpg(s0, w0, wal(s1, w1))
  19.36iv(s0, wal(s1, w1), w0)
  mpbi(wex(s0, wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wi(w1, w0))))
  mp2an(wex(s0, wex(s1, wi(w1, w0))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  isseti(s0, c0)
  isseti(s1, c1)
  sylbir(wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wi(w1, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  2eximi(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w0))
  biimpd(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), w1, w0)
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wi(w1, w0)), wi(wal(s1, w1), w0))
  19.36v(s1, w1, w0)

blocks.content: Implicit substitution of classes for setvar variables. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)

thm vtocl3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- w0

  -| w1

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {

  19.36iv(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)), w0)
  mpbi(wex(s0, wi(wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)), w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wi(wal(s2, w1), w0))))
  mpbi(wex(s0, wex(s1, wi(wal(s2, w1), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wi(w1, w0)))))
  mp3an(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wi(w1, w0)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), c2)))
  isseti(s0, c0)
  isseti(s1, c1)
  isseti(s2, c2)
  sylbir(w3a(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wi(w1, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2))))))
  eeeanv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2))
  2eximi(s0, s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2))), wex(s2, wi(w1, w0)))
  eximi(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2)), wi(w1, w0))
  biimpd(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w1, w0)
  2exbii(s0, s1, wex(s2, wi(w1, w0)), wi(wal(s2, w1), w0))
  19.36v(s2, w1, w0)
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wi(wal(s2, w1), w0)), wi(wal(s1, wal(s2, w1)), w0))
  19.36v(s1, wal(s2, w1), w0)
  gen2(s1, s2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s2), c2)

  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm vtocl3gf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {

  -| w3

  nfim(s1, wcel(c0, universe), w2)
  nfel1(s1, c0, universe)
  nfim(s2, wcel(c0, universe), w0)
  nfel1(s2, c0, universe)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, universe), w1, w2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wcel(c0, universe), w2, w0)

  diff.universe.s(s2)

thm vtocl3gf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {

thm spcimdv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  sylc(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
  ex(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2))
  spcimgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0, w1)‚Üí w2))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {

  ex(w0, s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üí w2))
  spcimgft(s0, c0, c1, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: spc2egv
blocks.content: Existential specialization with two quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc2egv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, w1))))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w1)
  biimprcd(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc2egv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w1))))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5com((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), w0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w1)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))))
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2)))
  anim12i(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0), ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, s0 = c0, s1 = c2)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), w1)
  biimprcd(w0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: spc2gv
blocks.content: Specialization with two quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc2gv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w1))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  con4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w1)
  syl6ibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(w1), wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wn(w0))))
  spc2egv(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wn(w1), wn(w0))
  notbid(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w0, w1)
  2nalexn(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc2gv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w0))‚Üí w1))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  con4d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w0)), w1)
  syl6ibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ¬¨ w1, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w0)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ¬¨ w0)))
  spc2egv(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ¬¨ w1, ¬¨ w0)
  notbid((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), w0, w1)
  2nalexn(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}

blocks.name: spc2ed
blocks.content: Existential specialization with 2 quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc2ed(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wi(w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, w2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylan2(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, w2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  impancom(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, w2)))
  eximd(s0, wa(w0, w1), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wex(s1, w2))
  nfan(s0, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  eximd(s1, wa(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, w1)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  ex(wa(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w2)
  sylbir(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), w2, wa(w1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  bitr3i(wa(w1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wa(w1, w0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  anass(w1, w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  anbi1i(wa(w1, w0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(w0, w1))
  ancom(w1, w0)
  biimparc(w1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), w2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc2ed(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(w1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w2))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylan2(w0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (w1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w2))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))))
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2)))
  anim12i(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0), ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, s0 = c0, s1 = c2)
  impancom(w0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))), w1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w2)))
  eximd(s0, (w0 ‚àß w1), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)), ‚àÉ(s1, w2))
  nfan(s0, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  eximd(s1, (w0 ‚àß w1), (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, w1)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  ex((w0 ‚àß w1), (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), w2)
  sylbir(((w0 ‚àß w1)‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)), w2, (w1 ‚àß(w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))))
  bitr3i((w1 ‚àß(w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))), ((w0 ‚àß w1)‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)), ((w1 ‚àß w0)‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)))
  anass(w1, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))
  anbi1i((w1 ‚àß w0), (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2), (w0 ‚àß w1))
  ancom(w1, w0)
  biimparc(w1, (w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)), w2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: spc2d
blocks.content: Specialization with 2 quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), w2))
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w2)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5bir(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), w2, wn(wex(s0, wex(s1, wn(w1)))))
  con1bii(wex(s0, wex(s1, wn(w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
  2nalexn(s0, s1, w1)
  con1d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wn(w1))), w2)
  spc2ed(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, wn(w2), wn(w1))
  nfn(s0, w2)
  nfn(s1, w2)
  notbid(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), w1, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w1))‚Üí w2))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2))‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5bir((w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w1)), w2, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ¬¨ w1)))
  con1bii(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ¬¨ w1)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, w1)))
  2nalexn(s0, s1, w1)
  con1d((w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ¬¨ w1)), w2)
  spc2ed(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, ¬¨ w2, ¬¨ w1)
  nfn(s0, w2)
  nfn(s1, w2)
  notbid((w0 ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)), w1, w2)
}

blocks.name: spc3egv
blocks.content: Existential specialization with three quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc3egv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wi(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))))
  -| wi(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl5com(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4))))))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4))))), w3a(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), c4))))
  3anim123i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), c4)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  elisset(s2, c4, c5)
  eeeanv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4))
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w0, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4))), wex(s2, w1))
  eximdv(s2, w0, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), w1)
  biimprcd(w0, w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s2), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc3egv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, w1)))))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl5com((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), w0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, w1))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4)))))
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4)))), (‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2, s2 = c4)))
  3anim123i(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c5, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c0), ‚àÉ(s1, s1 = c2), ‚àÉ(s2, s2 = c4))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  elisset(s2, c4, c5)
  eeeanv(s0, s1, s2, s0 = c0, s1 = c2, s2 = c4)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, w0, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4)), ‚àÉ(s2, w1))
  eximdv(s2, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4), w1)
  biimprcd(w0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4), w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s2, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: spc3gv
blocks.content: Specialization with three quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc3gv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), w1))
  -| wi(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  con4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), w1)
  syl6ibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wn(w1), wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wn(w0)))))
  spc3egv(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wn(w1), wn(w0))
  notbid(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), w0, w1)
  bitr2i(wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wn(w0)))), wex(s0, wn(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)))))
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))))
  bitri(wex(s1, wex(s2, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wal(s2, w0))), wex(s1, wn(wal(s2, w0))))
  exbii(s1, wex(s2, wn(w0)), wn(wal(s2, w0)))
  exnal(s2, w0)
  exnal(s1, wal(s2, w0))
  exnal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, w0)))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s2, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc3gv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0)))‚Üí w1))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  con4d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0))), w1)
  syl6ibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ¬¨ w1, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, ¬¨ w0))))
  spc3egv(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, ¬¨ w1, ¬¨ w0)
  notbid((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2 ‚àß s2 = c4), w0, w1)
  bitr2i(¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, ¬¨ w0))), ‚àÉ(s0, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0))))
  exbii(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, ¬¨ w0)), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0)))
  bitri(‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, ¬¨ w0)), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0)), ‚àÉ(s1, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s2, w0)))
  exbii(s1, ‚àÉ(s2, ¬¨ w0), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s2, w0))
  exnal(s2, w0)
  exnal(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0))
  exnal(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, w0)))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s2, w1)
}

blocks.name: spc2ev
blocks.content: Existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm spc2ev(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mp2an(wi(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, w1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  spc2egv(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm spc2ev(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w1)))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mp2an((w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, w1))), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  spc2egv(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: rspct
blocks.content: A closed version of ~ rspc . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 6-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspct(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), w1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.43d(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), w1))
  com34(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0), w1)
  syl7bi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
  syl(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1))), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1)))))
  alimi(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1))))
  a2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1), wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1)))
  ex(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1), wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1)))
  imbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0, wcel(c0, c1), w1)
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c1)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  simpr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  spcgft(s0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w1)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspct(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1)))‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)‚Üí w1)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.43d(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)‚Üí w1))
  com34(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))), c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0), w1)
  syl7bi(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
  syl(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0))‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1)))))
  alimi(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1)), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))))
  a2i(s0 = c0, (w0 ‚Üî w1), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1)))
  ex(s0 = c0, (w0 ‚Üî w1), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1)))
  imbi12d((s0 = c0 ‚àß(w0 ‚Üî w1)), s0 ‚àà c1, w0, c0 ‚àà c1, w1)
  adantr(s0 = c0, (w0 ‚Üî w1), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî c0 ‚àà c1))
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  simpr(s0 = c0, (w0 ‚Üî w1))
  spcgft(s0, c0, c1, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))
  nfim(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, w1)
  nfv(s0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rspcdf
blocks.content: Restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 16-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspcdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylc(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))), wcel(c1, c0))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2)))
  ex(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  rspct(s0, c1, c0, w1, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspcdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)‚Üí w2))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylc(w0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)‚Üí w2), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c1 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))), c1 ‚àà c0)
  alrimi(s0, w0, (s0 = c1 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2)))
  ex(w0, s0 = c1, (w1 ‚Üî w2))
  rspct(s0, c1, c0, w1, w2)
}

blocks.name: rspc
blocks.content: Restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0), w1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
  pm2.43a(wcel(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), w1)
  spcgf(s0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfim(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w1)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, c1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0, wcel(c0, c1), w1)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)‚Üí w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0), w1, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
  pm2.43a(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)), w1)
  spcgf(s0, c0, c1, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfim(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, w1)
  nfv(s0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà c1, w0, c0 ‚àà c1, w1)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rspce
blocks.content: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspce(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  anabsi5(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  spcegf(s0, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, c1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspce(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w1), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)))
  anabsi5(c0 ‚àà c1, w0, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)))
  spcegf(s0, c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfan(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  nfv(s0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà c1, w1, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rspcimdv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  syl5bi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), w2, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w1)
  mpid(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), w2, wcel(c1, c0))
  spcimdv(s0, c1, c0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(c1, c0), w2))
  imim12d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1, wcel(c1, c0), w2)
  biimprd(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1d(cv(s0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(c1, c0), w2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)‚Üí w2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üí w2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)

  df-ral(s0, c0, w1)

  spcimdv(s0, c1, c0, w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w1), (c1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w2))
  imim12d((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1), s0 ‚àà c0, w1, c1 ‚àà c0, w2)
  biimprd((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1), c1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0)

  simpr(w0, s0 = c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, c1 ‚àà c0, w2)

}

thm rspcebdv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)

  biimpd(wa(w0, w1), w1, w2)
  syldan(w0, w1, wb(w1, w2), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  rspcedv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w2, w1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rspceaimv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wi(w0, w1))), wrex(s1, c1, wral(s0, c2, wi(w2, w1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  rspcev(s1, c0, c1, wral(s0, c2, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c2, wi(w2, w1)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wi(w2, w1), wi(w0, w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), w2, w1, w0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c2, wi(w0, w1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspceaimv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(w0 ‚Üí w1)))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(w2 ‚Üí w1))))
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c0 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  rspcev(s1, c0, c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(w0 ‚Üí w1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(w2 ‚Üí w1)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, s1 = c0, (w2 ‚Üí w1), (w0 ‚Üí w1))
  imbi1d(s1 = c0, w2, w1, w0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c2, (w0 ‚Üí w1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm rspc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, w0)), w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w2)

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylan9(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, w0)), w1, wral(s1, c3, w2))
  rspc(s0, c0, c1, wral(s1, c3, w0), wral(s1, c3, w2))
  nfral(s0, s1, c3, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  ralbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w2)
  rspc(s1, c2, c3, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)

  rspc(s0, c0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, w2))

  ralbidv(s1, c3, s0 = c0, w0, w2)
  rspc(s1, c2, c3, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)

}

} = {

  simpl1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), w0)

  ralcom4(s2, s0, c2, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), w1))

  2ralbidv(s1, s2, c1, c2, w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), w1)), w2)

thm rexraleqim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))), w2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w0))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

  rexlimiva(s0, c0, w0, wi(wral(s1, c0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), w2))

  rspcva(s1, cv(s0), c0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c1)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0, w2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), w2)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w1, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)

  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)

}

thm eqvincg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {
  impbid1(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))

  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wi(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s0, wa(wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  eximi(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  jca(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  ax-1(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, c2))
  ex(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  eqtr(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  eximi(s0, wa(wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  pm3.43(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2))

  exlimiv(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c0, c2))

thm eqvincg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 = c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß s0 = c2))))

  pm3.43(c0 = c2, s0 = c0, s0 = c2)
  19.37v(s0, c0 = c2, (s0 = c0 ‚àß s0 = c2))

blocks.content: A variable introduction law for class equality, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvincf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  bitri(wceq(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  eqvinc(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfv(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
}

  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))

  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  sb56(s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: ceqex

blocks.origin:
thm ceqex(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbid(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  ex(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  19.8a(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  sylbird(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  syl(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqvisset(s0, c0)
  alexeqg(s0, c0, universe, w0)
  com12(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w0)
  sp(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0))
}

thm pm13.183(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {

  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  bibi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  impbii(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wal(s0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  alrimiv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  syl(wal(s0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wsb(hs0, s0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  stdpc4(s0, hs0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  sylbi(wsb(hs0, s0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  sbbi(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  sylbi(wb(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  bibi2i(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqsb3(hs0, s0, c2)
  mpi(wb(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  equsb1v(hs0, s0)
  biimp(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  sbbi(hs0, s0, s0 = hs0, s0 = c2)
